short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Beltone Purchase Order Extension for Sycle

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This app allows Beltone clinics to submit orders to Beltone Electronics, directly through Sycle.net via Microsoft Graph API. 

This extension now includes "QuickScan Mode", which allows you to add items to an invoice with ease. This can reduce the amount of clicks 90% when processing an invoice.
